attributes.action: Stop Renaming of Mons Hall Sandhurst
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned demand the governemnt overturn the disrespectful, disgraceful and insulting decision to rename Mons Hall RMA Sandhurst to that of an arab head of state of an undemocratic country for the sake of money. The men it was dedicated to, fought and gave their lives in defence of the very Democracy you now desicrate, by allowing it to be given away by direspectful, spawning, seat polishers. Furher more we call on any future govenrment to reinstate its rightful name if this current governemnt refuse to listen.
